content: PPH S Sharp-point metal stud screws Interior metal framing screw (phosphate-coated) for fastening stud to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The screws can be driven quickly thanks to optimized stitch point geometry Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti stitch-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 1002 performance requirements Applications Fastening light track to light studs – maximum combined thickness 0.0375 inch ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Pan head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Pan head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 25 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 86206 - Framing screw 7 x 7/16 PPH S - Package Size 10000 pc - 86207 - Framing screw 6 x 7/16 PPH S - Package Size 10000 pc - 3506318 - Framing screw 7 x 7/16 PPH S 1/2 pall - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 240000x Framing screw 7 x 7/16 PPH S - 3506447 - Framing screw 7 x 7/16 PPH S pall - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 480000x Framing screw 7 x 7/16 PPH S
